title: S1 EP11: A Sit Down with Heron Preston
itunes:title: A Sit Down with Heron Preston
description: Heron Preston tells the story of how he and Virgil went from Myspace friends to joining New Guards Group, the company that launched his namesake brand Heron Preston.
content:encoded: Heron Preston tells the story of how he and Virgil went from Myspace friends to joining New Guards Group, the company that launched his namesake brand Heron Preston.
